bill_title: Honoring the 2003 Howard 13-14 year old Teener Baseball Team and the parents and coaching staff involved in the teener baseball program.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2003 Howard 13-14 year old Teener Baseball Team and the parents and coaching staff involved in the teener baseball program. WHEREAS, the 2003 Howard 13-14 year old Teener Baseball Team won the State A Championship, by virtue of outstanding character, sportsmanship, and dedication to excellence both on and off the field; and WHEREAS, the members of the state champion Howard Teener Baseball Team for 2003 include Jared Donahue, Austin Werkmeister, John Esser, Jonathon Noonan, Austin Van Hove, Logan Calmus, Jacob Johnson, Jeremy Torkelson, Jared Mengenhausen, Dustin Wingen, Dustin Dornbusch, Austin Genzlinger, Ethan Hegdahl, Thomas Charles, Matt Freeman, Michael Krempges, and Dane Dornbusch; and WHEREAS, the 2003 Howard 13-14 year old Teener Baseball Team received sponsorship from the Howard VFW, and, in addition, received superior coaching and guidance from their coaches Shane Werkmeister and John Mengenhausen: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2003 Howard 13-14 year old Teener Baseball Team be commended for their excellence in athletics and for winning the 2003 State A Championship.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2003 Howard 13-14 year old Teener Baseball Team and the parents and coaching staff involved in the teener baseball program. WHEREAS, the 2003 Howard 13-14 year old Teener Baseball Team won the State A Championship, by virtue of outstanding character, sportsmanship, and dedication to excellence both on and off the field; and WHEREAS, the members of the state champion Howard Teener Baseball Team for 2003 include Jared Donahue, Austin Werkmeister, John Esser, Jonathon Noonan, Austin Van Hove, Logan Calmus, Jacob Johnson, Jeremy Torkelson, Jared Mengenhausen, Dustin Wingen, Dustin Dornbusch, Austin Genzlinger, Ethan Hegdahl, Thomas Charles, Matt Freeman, Michael Krempges, and Dane Dornbusch; and WHEREAS, the 2003 Howard 13-14 year old Teener Baseball Team received sponsorship from the Howard VFW, and, in addition, received superior coaching and guidance from their coaches Shane Werkmeister and John Mengenhausen: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2003 Howard 13-14 year old Teener Baseball Team be commended for their excellence in athletics and for winning the 2003 State A Championship.
